definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
Shuanglong ravine in Mt Xiong'er national geological park 熊耳山[Xiong2 er3 shan1], Zaozhuang 棗莊|枣庄[Zao3 zhuang1], Shandong

sentences.english: The northwest Guangxi belongs to the rift zone of Dian(Yunnan)-Qian(Guizhou)-Gui(Guangxi) with a high temperature geothermal field.
sentences.chinese: 桂西北地区属滇黔桂裂谷，具高的地热场环境。

sentences.english: The ore-bearing volcanic rock series formed in initial stage of continental rifting.
sentences.chinese: 台矿火山岩系产于大陆裂谷作用的初期阶段。

sentences.english: The information of the tectonic geochemistry displays that the Pingdao granite is a intraplate rift type.
sentences.chinese: 构造地球化学信息显示岩体是大陆裂谷型花岗岩。

sentences.english: From the Cretaceous Period to the Cenozoic Period, the volcanism was mainly related to the rifting;
sentences.chinese: 从白垩纪至新生代，火山作用主要与裂谷作用有关。

sentences.english: Human cases of Rift Valley fever (RVF) continue to occur in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 人间裂谷热病例在苏丹持续增加。

sentences.english: There has been no evidence of outbreaks of RVF in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 没有证据显示在城市地区暴发裂谷热。

sentences.english: Lake Natron is one of the largest soda lakes in the Rift valley.
sentences.chinese: 纳特龙湖是大裂谷中最大的碱湖之一。

sentences.english: Acute RVF can be diagnosed using several different methods.
sentences.chinese: 急性裂谷热可采用不同方法进行诊断。

sentences.english: In mid-March, new clusters of Rift Valley Fever cases occurred.
sentences.chinese: 在3月中，发生了新的聚集性裂谷热病例。

sentences.english: The basalts created in three different times has the characters of continental rift.
sentences.chinese: 区内所见的三期玄武岩，明显具有大陆裂谷型特征。

sentences.english: They, too, found warm-water spots along the center of the rift valley.
sentences.chinese: 而且他们发现，沿裂谷中心线也有暖水点。

sentences.english: Zhuanmiao boron deposit is a szaibelyite deposit which is located in Liaoning-Jilin rift zone.
sentences.chinese: 砖庙硼矿为产在辽吉裂谷带的硼镁石矿床。

sentences.english: It was, at the time, the biggest recorded outbreak of Rift Valley fever in east Africa.
sentences.chinese: 那时，它是东非有记录的最大的裂谷热暴发。

sentences.english: It is a deep rift where the two plates pull apart.
sentences.chinese: 那是一条深邃的裂谷，横陈在两大板块的断裂处。

sentences.english: We are descending into the Galapagos Rift Valley.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在朝向加拉巴戈斯裂谷沉下。

sentences.english: Laboratory results from three cases in Khartoum state have been found negative for RVF.
sentences.chinese: 喀土穆州3个病例的实验室结果发现是裂谷热阴性。

definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
